name: West Guns
description:
West Guns is an action arcade game where you play as the most wanted gunslinger in town. Kill the bad guys and take down all the wanted signs to gain your freedom.

Features:

  • 2 game modes: Original and Survival.
  • 10 upgradable levels.
  • Great old school challenge and replayability.
  • Awesome music by Ascher Nathan and Bill Grahn.
